item.description: This photo was taken in Mogadishu, 1993. The man on the right was my father: John Boswell, Delta Force C-Squadron. The stories I‚Äôve heard would rattle you at your core. It‚Äôs always some 3rd gen ivy league white lib in America talking about how great Somalia is. Fuck Somalia.

item.description: üö® BREAKING: Elon Musk calls on Senate Republicans to NUKE the 60-vote filibuster so Trump's MAGA policies can be passed with only 51 votes This means we can pass ANYTHING we want with 50 Republicans + JD Vance, and zero Dems If we don't, Dems will. GET THIS DONE, NOW!

item.title: @elonmusk: üö®üá∫üá∏ ASMONGOLD ON MINNESOTA FRAUD: DENATURALIZE AND DEPORT ENTIRE SOMALI FAMILIES... TIM WALZ SHOULD ...
item.description: üö®üá∫üá∏ ASMONGOLD ON MINNESOTA FRAUD: DENATURALIZE AND DEPORT ENTIRE SOMALI FAMILIES... TIM WALZ SHOULD FACE "TREASON WITH CAPITAL PUNISHMENT" Asmongold, one of the most-watched content creators on the internet, unloaded on the Minnesota fraud scandal and said he's done voting unless politicians deliver maximum accountability: "You have to make the punishment infinitely worse than the crime. I'm talking about deporting the entire family, denaturalizing the entire family, sending the entire group of them back to Somalia. That's what needs to happen. If JD Vance does not push for treason with capital punishment against Tim Walz, do not vote for him. If Trump does not deliver that, do not vote for him." His bottom line: "Unless the most extreme, dramatic, brutal, aggressive option is on the table," he's out. Asmongold's audience skews young, male, and politically disengaged, exactly the demographic Republicans need. When someone with his reach tells millions of viewers that half-measures aren't enough, politicians should pay attention. The frustration is real. Billions stolen. Officials who looked the other way. A system that punishes taxpayers while protecting fraudsters. Whether you agree with his prescription or not, he's voicing what a lot of people are thinking: accountability without consequences isn't accountability at all. Source:@Asmongold@Rightanglenews

item.title: @elonmusk: üá∫üá∏üá∏üá¥ SOMALI DAYCARES BUSTED FOR FRAUD IN MINNESOTA‚Ä¶ NOW ALL THEIR PHONE NUMBERS ARE DEAD A woman tri...
item.description: üá∫üá∏üá∏üá¥ SOMALI DAYCARES BUSTED FOR FRAUD IN MINNESOTA‚Ä¶ NOW ALL THEIR PHONE NUMBERS ARE DEAD A woman tried calling every single daycare tied to the massive Somali daycare fraud in Minnesota. Not one answered. No rings, no callbacks, just disconnected lines like they never existed. And that happened right after they were exposed for not having kids while taking money from the government. That‚Äôs not shady at all, right? Millions gone, and suddenly no one‚Äôs home. If this was all above board, why are they all vanishing faster than the tax dollars they pocketed? The answer seems quite clear. Source:@WallStreetApes, maggswegner

item.title: @elonmusk: Over the last week, SBA has reviewed thousands of potentially fraudulent pandemic-era PPP and EIDL l...
item.description: Over the last week, SBA has reviewed thousands of potentially fraudulent pandemic-era PPP and EIDL loans approved in Minnesota. Today, our agency took action to suspend 6,900 Minnesota borrowers amid suspected fraudulent activity. In total, these borrowers were approved for 7,900 PPP and EIDL loans worth approximately $400M. These individuals will be banned from all SBA loan programs, including disaster loans, going forward. We will also refer every case, where appropriate, to federal law enforcement for prosecution and repayment. After years, the American people will finally begin to see the criminals who stole from law-abiding taxpayers held accountable - and this is just the first state.
